concept.title: A Definition of DITA
concept.shortdesc: DITA can be defined an open standard for creating, sharing and re-using content.

conbody.p: Just as they provided a good definition of what architecture means in the DITA context, Rockley, Manning et al follow up with a lovely, succinct definition of DITA.
conbody.lq: DITA is an open content standard that defines a common structure for content that promotes the consistent creation, sharing, and reuse of content.
